ScriptItemPortable.SourceCode:
def Load(widget): from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import BreadcrumbEntityHandle, WesSiteMapNode breadCrumbList = WesSiteMapNode.GetBreadcrumbEntityHandles()
requisicao = breadCrumbList.Find(lambda found:found.EntityDefinitionName.Equals("CP_REQUISICOES")) requisicaoCotacao = breadCrumbList.Find(lambda found:found.EntityDefinitionName.Equals("CP_REQUISICAOCOTACOES"))
campoRequisicao = widget.Entity.Fields["REQUISICAO"]
if campoRequisicao.Handle.IsInvalid: campoRequisicao.Handle = requisicao.Handle
widget.Entity.Fields["REQUISICAOCOTACAO"].Handle = requisicaoCotacao.Handle
